topic.title: How to Use Change the Numbering System of the Ordered Lists

body.p: Assume you want to change all lists to have a different numbering system.

section.title: Use the list-style-type CSS property.
section.p: Chemistry supports the types: decimal, decimal-leading-zero, lower-roman, upper-roman, lower-latin, upper-latin, lower-alpha, upper-alpha.

section.title: Change the content of the :marker CSS pseudo element.
